name: MEC Toasty Mitts - Infants to Children
description:
Insulated mitts for the sled set. These warm mittens will help keep little hands protected from the cold and wet.Shell is 2-layer waterproof-breathable polyester, with a polyurethane laminate and a durable water repellent finish.Shells are not taped at seams, but material and DWR provide excellent protection from wind, rain and snow.Fleece lined for softness.Insulated with 300g polyester fibrefill (60g in palms) for comfort and warmth.Durable, polyurethane-coated nylon palms aid gripping.Stretchy elastic in wrists pulls over clothes.Reflective piping on hands.

        Sustainability
